name: Pariah's Resolve
description: Channel Volendrung's power to grant Major Brutality, Major Endurance, and Major Expedition to you and nearby group members for 20 seconds, increasing your Weapon Damage by 20%, your Stamina Recovery by 30%, and your Movement speed by 30%.  Activating this ability removes all snares and immobilizations from you.
rawDescription:
Channel Volendrung's power to grant Major Brutality, Major Endurance, and Major Expedition to you and nearby group members for <<1>>, increasing your Weapon Damage by <<2>>, your Stamina Recovery by <<3>>, and your Movement speed by <<4>>.

Activating this ability removes all snares and immobilizations from you.
